product_name: Patagonia Capilene 4 Expedition Weight Long Underwear Zip-T - Men's
long_description: The warmest, breathable base layer in the Patagonia Capilene line, Capilene 4 Expedition Weight long underwear Zip-T keeps you dry and comfortable in cold weather and vents heat with a zipper.
short_description: The warmest, breathable base layer in the Patagonia Capilene line, Capilene 4 Expedition Weight long underwear Zip-T keeps you dry and comfortable in cold weather and vents heat with a zipper.
